explain.groupDelete: Deleting the group cannot be undone. Content associated with the group will also be deleted. Do you want to cancel your membership without deleting the group?

chat.message: The group chat is currently in preparation and will be available shortly. Please try again in a few minutes.
chat.title: A little more patience

meetings.message: The group has its own video meeting room, which can be used by all members around the clock.
meetings.title: Your digital meeting point
